Desc.entry: Weekly duplicate bridge matches played Tues-Sat evenings. Afternoon sessions also available by arrangement. Friendly matches and social evenings are also organised. Both beginners and improvers classes are available with tuition provided by Ann Wall and Jean Rodgers (see separate entries). All welcome.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 1-4.30pm (informal, friendly duplicate session, all welcome), Tues & Thurs at 7.15pm (matches - must be able to play to a high standard), Wed 7.15-10.30pm (duplicate bridge class for improvers), Wed, Fri & Sat at 7.15pm (duplicate bridge, standby system in operation),
